content: Galaxy tab 2, signing in screen is not clear with logging in as opposed to the ipads and my android phone
I cannot get it to install, after download.
Generally works well. Does not intergrate with Google Assistant

The app worked great until the v3 release. I use some wall mount tablets and had 2 columns of widgets but after the v3 update, only a single column appears. I have refreshed the project in PICED and removed and reinstalled the app to no avail. Now there is a load of black space either side of a long clunky single column in my kitchen/dining room zones. Please either fix this bug ASAP or release a feature so users can customise and scale the layout entirely at their discretion.

After not working on mobile network yesterday, today when I was out I gave it another try and it worked. Samsung Note 9 running Android pie. Well, today it would not connect remotely, would keep trying local and crash. Sent feedback multiple times. Does anyone read the feedback? Change rating to 1 star

Do Not Buy C-bus Automation with Wiser - Clipsal do not update their products. Wiser no longer works under Chrome based browsers due Flash no longer being supported. Clipsal have refused to update Wiser hardware to address these problems and security issue.
This app works great with ipad but Samsung always says disconnected. Sometimes works sometimes doesnt. Hopeless!!!
Can this app be made compatible with Android Auto please ?
Cannot get beyond settings screen???
Android 7  on Huawei p8 lite : app would start but light buttons do not work. Wiser 1 bombs out when you touch any light button. Had to resort to using a pad until fixed
Splendid
Wiser1 was working on my android phone. Wiser 2 is not working. I see the room breakup. But it does not switch. In apple it is working, but in android it is not working. Bad upgrade.

Wiser 1 was very stable and you had much better icons and more on a page. This new version is bland and sliders areway too big.  Also the original had Google voice commands but this one hasn't. Pull your finger out guys and Dev this properly.
Apple wiser app works better. Android app doesnt work with most ip cameras however apple's does.

Application does not load fully if left in the background in Android 6.0. You must exit the app completely and reopen to have the UI connect to system. New observation of elements (i.e. dimmer bars) not showing correct level even when the light is indicated as "ON". Contact me for screenshot.
Nothing more to it...  Typical Clipsal.

Is there any way to send instructions from IFTTT to a Wiser 2? That would make it so much more useful - e.g email to turn lights on, open gates based on location etc. Is there a work around to do this?
Hated it

Between Wi-Fi and 3g have to constantly log in log out etc....I've tried to delete lan address and only use static IP but no difference. FIXED..when finished using the app, I now press the back button instead of the home button.
Now that Ripple support has been added it does what it has to now. And saving favourites works correctly too.
Works OK in WiFi mode but cannot save favourites. In 3g remote mode the Wiser connects but not the CBus port. Works fine in all modes using same config on my iPhone.
WiFi works... but when.in.3g or 4g mode it doesn't not connect.. however on an iPhone WiFi and 3g or 4g it works... with all settings the same.. plz fix bugs
Great looking app. Connects but nothing works. Did anyone bother to test it.
Shows all controls but none of them work
